scripts.build: cd common && npm run build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build && cd ..
scripts.clean: cd common && npm run clean && cd ../frontend && npm run clean && cd ../server && npm run clean && cd ..
scripts.setup-modules: npm install && cd common && npm install && npm link && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm link rpgcore-common && cd ../server && npm install && npm link rpgcore-common && cd ..
scripts.clean-all: npm run clean && npm run clean-modules
